# Daily Progress Report Template - Plan A & B Execution
**Template Version**: 1.0
**Purpose**: Track daily progress, identify blockers, coordinate swarm agents
**Frequency**: Daily at 9:00 AM, 1:00 PM, 5:00 PM

---

## Report Header

**Date**: YYYY-MM-DD
**Day Number**: [1-10 of execution plan]
**Report Time**: [Morning/Midday/Evening]
**Report Generated By**: [Planner Agent / Coordinator]
**Swarm Status**: [HEALTHY / DEGRADED / CRITICAL]

---

## Agent Status & Allocation

### Active Agents
| Agent ID | Agent Type | Current Task | Status | Progress | Estimated Completion |
|----------|------------|--------------|--------|----------|---------------------|
| agent-001 | DevOps Engineer | Task 1.1: Backup Scripts | IN_PROGRESS | 60% | 11:00 AM |
| agent-002 | Security Auditor | Task 1.3: SQL Injection Fix | COMPLETED | 100% | 10:30 AM |
| agent-003 | Backend Developer | Task 1.2: Environment Config | BLOCKED | 40% | TBD |
| ... | ... | ... | ... | ... | ... |

### Agent Status Legend
- **IDLE**: Agent available for assignment
- **IN_PROGRESS**: Agent actively working on task
- **BLOCKED**: Agent waiting on dependency
- **COMPLETED**: Task finished, agent available
- **ERROR**: Agent encountered error, needs intervention

### Resource Utilization
- **Total Agents Allocated**: [X] of [Y] available
- **Agent Efficiency**: [X]% (agents in_progress / total allocated)
- **Swarm Topology**: [HIERARCHICAL / MESH / STAR / RING]

## Appendix: Detailed Agent Activity Log

### Agent-001 (DevOps Engineer)
**Task**: 1.1 Backup Scripts Review
**Status**: COMPLETED
**Duration**: 2h 45m (09:00 - 11:45)

**Activity Timeline**:
- 09:00: Pre-task hook executed
- 09:15: Started backup script review
- 09:45: Identified 2 potential issues in postgres-backup.sh
- 10:15: Fixed issues, added validation
- 10:30: Created test backup (PostgreSQL)
- 10:45: Validated backup integrity (checksum matched)
- 11:00: Created test backup (MinIO)
- 11:15: Validated MinIO backup
- 11:30: Committed all scripts to version control
- 11:45: Post-task hook executed

**Outputs**:
- 4 backup scripts tested and committed
- Backup validation procedures documented
- RTO measured: 12 minutes (under 15-minute target)

**Quality Score**: 9.5/10 (excellent work, minor documentation improvement needed)

### Agent-002 (Security Auditor)
**Task**: 1.3 SQL Injection Fix
**Status**: COMPLETED
**Duration**: 1h 30m (09:00 - 10:30)

**Activity Timeline**:
- 09:00: Pre-task hook executed
- 09:10: Reviewed vulnerable code in companies.py
- 09:30: Implemented column whitelist
- 09:45: Added security tests
- 10:00: Ran security test suite (15 tests, all passed)
- 10:15: Code review by peer agent
- 10:30: Post-task hook executed

**Outputs**:
- SQL injection vulnerability fixed
- 15 security tests added
- Security audit documentation updated

**Quality Score**: 10/10 (comprehensive fix with excellent tests)

## Report Sign-Off

**Report Generated By**: Planner Agent (Strategic Planning Agent)
**Report Reviewed By**: [Coordinator / Project Lead]
**Next Report Due**: [Date & Time]

**Overall Day Status**: [ON TRACK / AT RISK / BEHIND SCHEDULE / AHEAD OF SCHEDULE]
**Recommendation**: [PROCEED AS PLANNED / ADJUST TIMELINE / ESCALATE BLOCKERS / ADD RESOURCES]

---

**Template Instructions**:
1. Fill this template three times daily (9 AM, 1 PM, 5 PM)
2. Morning report focuses on planning and allocation
3. Midday report focuses on progress and blockers
4. Evening report focuses on completion and tomorrow's prep
5. Use automation where possible (agent status, metrics)
6. Keep it concise but comprehensive
7. Highlight critical issues immediately
8. Celebrate wins to maintain team morale

**Automation Hooks**:
- Agent status: Query via `npx claude-flow@alpha agent list`
- Swarm status: Query via `npx claude-flow@alpha swarm status`
- Metrics: Pull from `.claude-flow/metrics/` directory
- Git commits: Parse git log for today's activity

**Storage**:
- Daily reports saved to: `docs/plans/daily-reports/YYYY-MM-DD-[morning|midday|evening].md`
- Indexed in: `docs/plans/daily-reports/INDEX.md`
- Accessible to all swarm agents via memory coordination

---

**Document Version**: 1.0
**Last Updated**: 2025-10-25
**Template Owner**: Planner Agent
